metadata.title: CVE-2021-3597 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in undertow. The HTTP2SourceChannel fails to write thefinal frame under some circumstances, resulting in a denial of service. Thehighest threat from this vulnerability is availability. This flaw affectsUndertow versions prior to 2.0.35.SP1, prior to 2.2.6.SP1, prior to2.2.7.SP1, prior to 2.0.36.SP1, prior to 2.2.9.Final and prior to2.0.39.Final.

criterions.comment: undertow package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
